00033 Menu::Menu(const std::string& STR_Name, const Help& CLI_Help)
00034   : SyntaxNode(STR_Name, CLI_Help),
00035     m_pcliHelp(NULL), m_pcliExit(NULL), m_pcliQuit(NULL), m_pcliPwm(NULL)
00036 {
00037 }

00043 Keyword& Menu::GetHelpNode(void)

00045     return *m_pcliHelp;

00082 
00083 void Menu::SetCli(Cli& CLI_Cli)
00084 {
00085     SyntaxNode::SetCli(CLI_Cli);
00086     {   Help cli_Help(Help().AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "Get help"));
00087         m_pcliHelp = dynamic_cast<Keyword*>(& AddElement(new Keyword("help", cli_Help)));
00088         m_pcliHelp->AddElement(new Endl(cli_Help)); }
00089     {   Help cli_Help(Help().AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "Exit menu " + GetKeyword()));
00090         m_pcliExit = dynamic_cast<Keyword*>(& AddElement(new Keyword("exit", cli_Help)));
00091         m_pcliExit->AddElement(new Endl(cli_Help)); }
00092     {   Help cli_Help(Help().AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "Quit"));
00093         m_pcliQuit = dynamic_cast<Keyword*>(& AddElement(new Keyword("quit", cli_Help)));
00094         m_pcliQuit->AddElement(new Endl(cli_Help)); }
00095     {   Help cli_Help(Help().AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "Print Working Menu"));
00096         m_pcliPwm = dynamic_cast<Keyword*>(& AddElement(new Keyword("pwm", cli_Help)));
00097         m_pcliPwm->AddElement(new Endl(cli_Help)); }
00098 }
00099 
00100 const bool Menu::ExecuteReserved(const CommandLine& CLI_CommandLine) const
00101 {
00102     if (0) {}
00103     else if (& CLI_CommandLine[0] == & GetHelpNode())
00104     {
00105         if (dynamic_cast<const Endl*>(& CLI_CommandLine[1]))
00106         {
00107             GetShell().DisplayHelp();
00108             return true;
00109         }
00110     }
00111     else if (& CLI_CommandLine[0] == & GetExitNode())
00112     {
00113         if (dynamic_cast<const Endl*>(& CLI_CommandLine[1]))
00114         {
00115             GetShell().ExitMenu();
00116             return true;
00117         }
00118     }
00119     else if (& CLI_CommandLine[0] == & GetQuitNode())
00120     {
00121         if (dynamic_cast<const Endl*>(& CLI_CommandLine[1]))
00122         {
00123             GetShell().Quit();
00124             return true;
00125         }
00126     }
00127     else if (& CLI_CommandLine[0] == & GetPwmNode())
00128     {
00129         if (dynamic_cast<const Endl*>(& CLI_CommandLine[1]))
00130         {
00131             GetShell().PrintWorkingMenu();
00132             return true;
00133         }
00134     }
00135 
00136     return false;
00137 }
00138 
00139 const bool Menu::Execute(const CommandLine& CLI_CommandLine) const
00140 {
00141     GetErrorStream() << "(no execution defined)" << endl;
00142     return true;
00143 }
